title: Men's Long Sleeve Double Pocket Snap Denim Shirt
description: RELAXED FIT. This men's button down work shirt is made with a classic, relaxed fit. This long sleeve buttoned shirt is your go-to, great for wearing alone
DURABLE MATERIALS. Made with 131% cotton, this versatile shirt is comfortable for those long workdays and remains durable after each wash.

EXQUISITE CRAFTSMANSHIP. A variety of washing methods, enzyme washing, retro washing, snowflake washing, to meet your various preferences, while being soft, styling, hair removal, etc., making you more comfortable and easy to wear. The double-pocket with flap design can put some small items.
